title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.15 - Refusal to cash
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4300.15 - Refusal to cash

State Regulations
(a) An authorized
pari-mutuel wagering entity shall refuse to cash a pari-mutuel ticket if the
authorized pari-mutuel wagering entity determines the ticket has been: (1)
issued after the stop betting command was
issued; or
(2)
directed by the New

York State Department of Taxation and Finance or the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4300.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
